item.title: 特斯拉陷入困境，比亚迪再创季度销售佳绩
item.description: 中国比亚迪股份有限公司 2025 年开局强劲，第一季度销售额同比增长 58%。【原文：China’s BYD Co. enjoyed a strong start to 2025, with sales up 58% in the first quarter versus the same period of last year.】

item.title: 汇丰银行塔克表示对目标和强劲的股息前景充满信心
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的高级管理人员在香港向股东表示，他们将继续专注于派发股息，并致力于在亚洲地区实现增长。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc’s senior executives told shareholders in Hong Kong that they remained focused on paying out dividends and are committed to growing in the Asia region.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行取消国防资产投资限制
item.description: 丹斯克银行（Danske Bank A/S）正在取消阻止其资产管理和养老金部门持有国防资产的限制。【原文：Danske Bank A/S is removing restrictions that had prevented its asset management and pension units from holding defense assets.】

item.title: 期权专家忽视了材料企业面临的主要特朗普关税风险
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的一位策略师表示，期权交易商对材料类股票的风险定价过低，使得看跌的投资者能够以低廉的价格抵御唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税议程所带来的损失。【原文：Options traders are underpricing risks in materials stocks, allowing bearish investors to cheaply protect against losses wrought by President Donald Trump’s tariff agenda, according to a Barclays Plc strategist.】

item.title: 印度央行注资帮助消除创纪录的印度现金紧张状况
item.description: 印度银行业流动性三个多月来首次转为盈余，原因是中央银行积极注资，帮助消除了金融系统有史以来最严重的现金紧缩。【原文：Indian banking liquidity turned to surplus for the first time in more than three months as aggressive fund injections by the central bank helped erase one of the worst-ever cash crunches in the financial system.】

item.title: 美国关系恶化令南非商业前景暗淡
item.description: 由于与美国关系恶化的不确定性，需求复苏的步伐难以加快，南非商业景气连续第五个月处于萎缩状态。【原文：South African business sentiment remained in contractionary territory for a fifth straight month as a recovery in demand struggles to pick up pace amid uncertainty about deteriorating relations with the US.】

item.title: 美国即将加征关税，中国准备从印度购买更多产品
item.description: 中国驻印度大使徐飞鸿在美国宣布对南亚邻国征收关税之前表示，中国愿意购买更多印度产品以平衡贸易。【原文：China is willing to buy more Indian products to balance trade, Beijing’s Ambassador Xu Feihong said just ahead of a US tariff announcement expected to hit the south Asian neighbors.】

item.title: 欧洲游客开始将美国视为 "未知领域 "而避而远之
item.description: 法国雅高酒店集团（Accor SA）警告说，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）打击移民的政策令游客望而却步，今年夏天从欧洲前往美国的预订量下降了25%。【原文：French hotel group Accor SA has warned that forward bookings from Europe to the US are down 25% this summer as travelers that feel put off by US President Donald Trump’s ’s crackdown on immigration divert to other locations.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员考虑暂停降息，欧元区通胀放缓
item.description: 在官员们权衡下月是否继续降息之际，欧元区通胀率进一步向欧洲央行 2% 的目标放缓。【原文：Euro-area inflation eased further toward the European Central Bank’s 2% target as officials weigh whether or not to continue lowering interest rates next month.】

item.title: 乌克兰在特朗普再次批评后推进与美国的协议
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普指责基辅试图重新谈判经济协议数小时后，乌克兰最高外交官表示，乌克兰官员正在与美国加紧达成一项 "可接受的 "经济协议。【原文：Ukraine’s top diplomat said officials are pressing ahead with the US toward an “acceptable” economic accord hours after President Donald Trump accused Kyiv of trying to renegotiate the deal.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists cut their targets on European stocks due to the expected hit from President Donald Trump’s tariffs, making a contrarian bet at a time when the region has beaten US peers by a record.】

item.title: 据称，UltraGreen.ai 将酝酿在新加坡进行高达 3 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: UltraGreen.ai是一家用于医疗和手术成像的荧光技术提供商，熟悉此事的人士称，该公司正在考虑首次公开募股，以筹集多达4亿新元（约合2.98亿美元）的资金。【原文：UltraGreen.ai, a provider of fluorescence technology used in medical and surgical imaging, is considering an initial public offering to raise as much as S$400 million ($298 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普全球关税浪潮来袭前英国工厂出口下降
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普的美国政府与主要贸易伙伴之间针锋相对的关税冲突的威胁下，订单枯竭、信心萎靡，英国工厂出口需求以逾一年半以来最快的速度下滑。【原文：Demand for UK factory exports tumbled at the fastest pace in over 1 ½ years, as orders dried up and confidence wilted under the threat of a tit-for-tat tariffs skirmish between Donald Trump’s US administration and major trading partners.】

item.title: 瑞士绿色数据中心吸引了瑞士人寿和 KKR 的兴趣
item.description: 瑞士最大的数据中心运营商之一、InfraVia Capital Partners 旗下的 Green 公司吸引了保险公司、养老基金和私募股权公司的初步兴趣。【原文：One of Switzerland’s biggest data center operators Green, owned by InfraVia Capital Partners, has attracted initial interest from insurance companies, pension funds and private equity firms, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特斯拉延续欧洲市场低迷，法国销量下降 37
item.description: 特斯拉公司上个月在法国的销售额下降了 37%，这家电动汽车制造商在欧洲的表现依然不佳，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）在欧洲的政治参与和车型转换一直是主要障碍。【原文：Tesla Inc. sales fell 37% in France last month as the electric-vehicle maker continued its poor performance in Europe, where Elon Musk’s involvement in politics and a model changeover have been major hindrances.】

item.title: Ermotti 成为欧洲薪酬最高的银行首席执行官，Orcel 加薪 32
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）是去年欧洲大陆最大银行中收入最高的首席执行官，而意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德烈亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）的加薪幅度最大。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti was the highest-earning CEO across continental Europe’s biggest banks last year, while UniCredit SpA CEO Andrea Orcel got the largest raise.】

item.title: 美国抨击印度在 4 月 2 日前对农产品征收高额关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府在对等关税生效前几天强调了印度对美国农产品征收的高额关税，进一步向这个南亚国家施压，要求其减少对政治敏感的农业部门的限制。【原文：The Donald Trump administration highlighted India’s high tariffs on American farm goods just days before reciprocal duties kick in, putting further pressure on the South Asian nation to reduce curbs in its politically-sensitive agriculture sector.】

item.title: Northvolt 将瑞典破产率推至 1994 年以来最高点
item.description: 电池制造商 Northvolt AB 的倒闭使瑞典 3 月份的破产数量达到 1994 年以来的最高水平。【原文：The collapse of battery maker Northvolt AB helped drive the number of bankruptcies in Sweden to the highest level for the month of March since 1994.】

item.title: 奇货可居：美联储独立性面临的风险与日俱增（播客）
item.description: 上个月，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）解雇了联邦贸易委员会的两位民主党委员。此后，他们提起诉讼，认为创建联邦贸易委员会的法律以及有 90 年历史的最高法院判例禁止总统无故解雇他们。现在，看似小众的法律纠纷最终可能会对包括美联储在内的其他独立政府机构造成更大的影响。这对华尔街来说将是一个巨大的冲击，因为华尔街倾向于认为，美联储是一个独立的政府机构。【原文：Last month, Donald Trump fired the Federal Trade Commission’s two Democratic commissioners. That would be a huge shock for Wall Street, which tends to v】

item.title: 新世界放宽贷款条件，再次挖掘珍贵资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. is sweetening the terms of two loans it is seeking, using a prized asset it already pledged as collateral for another facility, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲零售业困境在消费低迷中创下十年新高
item.description: 据 Weil, Gotshal & Manges 公司的一份最新报告称，消费者信心的减弱和公众对经济放缓的担忧已使欧洲零售商的困境达到了自 2014 年 10 月以来的最高水平。【原文：Weakening consumer confidence and public fears of a slowing economy have driven distress among Europe’s retailers to its highest level since October 2014, according to a new report from Weil, Gotshal & Manges.】

item.title: 继欧盟之后，瑞士去年冻结的俄罗斯资产增加 28
item.description: 随着欧盟对数百名被认为与克里姆林宫关系密切的俄罗斯个人和公司实施进一步制裁，瑞士当局冻结的俄罗斯资产价值比一年前猛增了 28%。【原文：The value of Russian assets frozen by Swiss authorities jumped by 28% from a year earlier as the country embraced further European Union sanctions against hundreds of Russian individuals and companies deemed to be close to the Kremlin.】

item.title: 三星任命 TM Roh 领导消费和智能手机部门
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.）周二表示，其移动业务主管 TM Roh 将暂时转任新职，负责监督其消费者和智能手机业务。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. said on Tuesday that TM Roh, the head of its mobile business, will temporarily step into a new role to oversee its consumer and smartphone businesses.】

item.title: 日本 Rapidus 公司开始试生产人工智能芯片
item.description: 日本国家支持的芯片合资企业 Rapidus 公司周二开始试生产下一代芯片，这是日本制造自己的人工智能组件的早期但关键的一步。【原文：Japan’s state-backed chip venture Rapidus Corp. began test production of next-generation chips on Tuesday, an early but key step in the country’s efforts to make its own artificial intelligence components.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易威胁激发避险需求，黄金再创新高
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周将大幅升级贸易关税，加剧了人们对全球经济的担忧，并刺激了避险需求，黄金在新季度伊始创下了历史新高。【原文：Gold hit a record at the start of the new quarter as a major escalation in US President Donald Trump’s trade tariffs due this week heightened concerns about the global economy and fanned haven demand.】

item.title: 黄金反弹推动南非矿商创下历史最佳月度业绩
item.description: 金价飙升推动南非矿业股创下历史最佳月度表现，使该国基准指数免受全球市场混乱的影响。【原文：The surging gold price has propelled South African mining stocks to their best monthly performance on record, shielding the country’s benchmark index from the mayhem in global markets.】

item.title: 英国全国房地产协会称，英国房价增长在税收冲击前停滞不前
item.description: 英国房价七个月来首次没有增长，这表明由于一项重大税收减免政策将于今天到期，购房者在出价时可能会更加谨慎。【原文：UK house prices failed to grow for the first time in seven months, in a sign that buyers may be showing more restraint with their offers due to the expiration today of a major tax break.】

item.title: 2 亿英镑改造后，贝恩支持的英国保险公司着眼于英国的增长
item.description: 英国家庭和汽车保险公司 Esure Group Plc 首席执行官大卫-麦克米伦（David McMillan）表示，在实施了 2 亿英镑（约合 2.58 亿美元）的改革计划后，该公司在英国的业务将进一步增长。【原文：UK home and motor insurance firm Esure Group Plc sees further growth in the country after a £200 million ($258 million) revamp program, according to its Chief Executive Officer David McMillan.】
